lead_paragraph: Junior Seau, who had announced his retirement Monday, signed with New England. The team did not disclose terms of the deal with Seau, a 12-time Pro Bowl linebacker. The Patriots needed a linebacker because Tedy Bruschi has a broken hand and Willie McGinest left as a free agent.
